level.heading: Remedies pursuant to other laws; severability of provisions; liberality of article construction.
level.text: The provisions of this chapter are not exclusive, and the remedies provided for shall be in addition to any other remedies provided for in any other law or available pursuant to common law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-104
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-308.07.
